concise description.text: Elite Hex Spell. ( second[s].) Target foe's spells cause 10 Overcast.

description.text: Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level Vampiric Horror. Whenever a Vampiric Horror you control deals damage, you gain the same amount of Health.

concise description.text: Spell. Creates a level vampiric horror. You gain Health equal to the damage it deals.

description.text: Elite Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, target foe suffers Health degeneration. If that foe dies while hexed with Reaper's Mark, you gain  Energy.

concise description.text: Elite Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Causes Health degeneration. You gain  Energy if target foe dies while suffering from this hex.

description.text: Elite Hex Spell. Target foe is struck for cold damage and is hexed with Shatterstone for 3 seconds. When Shatterstone ends, that foe and all nearby foes are struck for  cold damage.

concise description.text: Elite Hex Spell. (3 seconds.) Initial effect: deals cold damage. End effect: deals  cold damage to target and all nearby foes.

description.text: Elite Item Spell. Hold Xinrae's ashes for up to seconds. While you hold her ashes, you cannot lose more than 20% of your max Health from a single hit. When you drop her ashes, you steal  Health from all nearby foes.

concise description.text: Elite Item Spell. ( seconds.) You cannot lose more than 20% of your max Health from a single hit. Drop effect: steal Health from nearby foes.

description.text: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, you have + Energy regeneration. This enchantment reapplies itself every time you cast a spell on a foe.

concise description.text: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) You have + Energy regeneration. Renewal: every time you cast a spell on an enemy.

description.text: Hex Spell. For  seconds, the next time you and target foe are more than 100' apart, you Shadow Step to that foe and that foe is knocked down. This spell has half the normal range.

concise description.text: Half Range Hex Spell. ( seconds.) Shadow Step to target foe and cause knock-down the next time this foe is more than 100' away from you.

description.text: Elite Hex Spell. Target foe is struck for cold damage. For  seconds, if target foe dies all nearby foes are struck for  cold damage.

concise description.text: Elite Hex Spell. ( seconds.) Deals cold damage to nearby foes if target foe dies. Initial effect: deals  cold damage.

description.text: Spell. Lava Arrows fly toward up to 3 foes near your target and strike for fire damage if they hit.

concise description.text: Spell. Projectile: deals fire damage. Bonus effect: sends projectiles at 2 other foes near your target.

description.text: Elite Enchantment Spell. For seconds, you cannot be the target of enemy spells, and you gain 5 damage reduction for each Assassin enchantment on you. You cannot deal more than  damage with a single skill or attack.

concise description.text: Elite Enchantment Spell. ( seconds.) Enemy spells cannot target you. Gain 5 damage reduction for each Assassin enchantment on you.

description.text: Elite Spell. Invoke a Ray of Judgment at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, target foe and all foes adjacent to this location take holy damage each second and begin Burning for  second[s].

concise description.text: Elite Spell. Deals holy damage and inflicts Burning ( second[s]) every second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

description.text: Elite Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level Flesh Golem. The Flesh Golem leaves an exploitable corpse. You can have only one Flesh Golem at a time.

concise description.text: Elite Spell. Creates a level flesh golem which leaves a fresh corpse when it dies.

description.text: Hex Spell. For seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes are hexed with Reckless Haste. While hexed, they attack 25% faster but have a 50% chance to miss with attacks.

concise description.text: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to your target ( seconds). These foes have 50% chance to miss, but attack 25% faster.

description.text: Elite Spell. You Ride the Lightning to target. All adjacent foes are Blinded for second[s].  If your target is a foe, it is struck for  lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.

concise description.text: Elite Spell. Deals lightning damage. 25% armor penetration. Blinds all adjacent foes ( second[s]). You instantly move to your target. May target allies.

description.text: Elite Enchantment Spell. For seconds, Energy Boon raises the maximum Health of you and target ally by  for each point of your respective maximum Energy.  When this enchantment is first applied, you and your target gain  Energy.  You gain an additional 1 Energy for every 2 points you have in Energy Storage.

concise description.text: Elite Enchantment Spell. ( seconds.) Maximum Health for you and target ally is increased by for each point of maximum Energy.  Initial effect: Both gain  Energy.  You gain +1 Energy for every 2 points of Energy Storage.

description.text: Shout. If there are any dead allies within earshot, your party moves 33% faster for seconds.

concise description.text: Shout. ( seconds.) Party members in earshot move 33% faster.

description.text: Spell. You and all adjacent foes are Poisoned for seconds.

concise description.text: Spell. Inflicts Poisoned condition ( seconds) to adjacent foes.

description.text: Spell. Target foe is struck for cold damage. If that foe is knocked down, that foe becomes Poisoned for  seconds.

concise description.text: Spell. Deals cold damage. Inflicts Poisoned condition ( seconds) if target foe is knocked-down.

description.text: Elite Enchantment Spell. For seconds, both you and target ally move 33% faster.  When you cast this spell, all foes near you and your target take  cold damage. Foes struck by Gust while attacking or moving are knocked down.

concise description.text: Elite Enchantment Spell. ( seconds.) You and target ally move 33% faster. Initial effect: Foes near you and target ally are struck for cold damage.  Attacking or moving foes are knocked down.

description.text: Spell. Target foe is struck for fire damage. If that foe is attacking or casting a spell, nearby foes are also struck for  fire damage.

concise description.text: Spell. Deals fire damage. Deals  fire damage to nearby foes if target was attacking or casting.

description.text: Spell. Target foe is struck for  cold damage. If target foe is on fire, Steam Blinds that foe for  seconds.

concise description.text: Spell. Deals cold damage. Inflicts Blindness condition ( seconds) if target foe is Burning.

description.text: Enchantment Spell. Remove one hex from target ally. If a hex was removed in this way, for seconds, the next time target ally would take damage, that damage is reduced by.

concise description.text: Enchantment Spell. ( seconds.) Removes one hex from target ally. The next damage this ally takes is reduced by.

description.text: Elite Bow Attack. If Melandru's Shot hits, your target begins Bleeding for seconds. If it hits a foe that is moving or knocked down, that foe takes + damage and is Crippled for  seconds.

concise description.text: Elite Bow Attack. Inflicts Bleeding ( seconds). Deals + damage and inflicts Crippled ( seconds) if target foe was moving or knocked down.

description.text: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds, whenever a party member hits a foe with physical damage, that foe loses one enchantment. For each Monk enchantment removed, you lose % maximum Health.

concise description.text: Elite Enchantment Spell. Enchants all party members (5 seconds). These party members remove one enchantment when they deal physical damage.

description.text: Spell. Target foe is struck for lightning damage and applies [sic] Cracked Armor for  seconds. Lightning Hammer has 25% armor penetration.

concise description.text: Spell. Deals lightning damage. Applies Cracked Armor ( seconds). 25% armor penetration.

description.text: Elite Shout. If target foe is moving, that foe is knocked down.

concise description.text: Elite Shout. Causes knock-down if target foe is moving.

description.text: Elite Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe and adjacent foes take damage whenever they use a skill and  additional damage if not under the effects of another Mesmer hex.

concise description.text: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (10 seconds). These foes take damage whenever they use a skill and  additional damage if not under the effects of another Mesmer hex.

description.text: Hex Spell. For 8 seconds, target foe has Health degeneration and takes  damage each second. When Illusion of Pain ends, that foe is healed for.

concise description.text: Hex Spell. (8 seconds.) Causes Health degeneration and target foe takes  damage each second. End effect: that foe is healed for.

description.text: Elite Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes are struck with Searing Flames. Foes already on fire when this skill is cast are struck for fire damage. Foes not already on fire begin Burning for  seconds.

concise description.text: Elite Spell. Hits foes near your target. Deals fire damage to foes already Burning. Inflicts Burning condition ( seconds) to foes not Burning.

description.text: Enchantment Spell. For seconds, all party members in earshot have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks. If an attack is blocked, all allies in earshot are healed for  and Shield Guardian ends.

concise description.text: Enchantment Spell. ( second[s]). Party members in earshot have a 75% chance to block attacks. Block effect: Allies in earshot are healed for, and Shield Guardian ends.

description.text: Shout. All nearby foes that are moving are knocked down. This skill recharges second[s] faster for each foe knocked down (maximum 25 seconds).

concise description.text: Shout. Knocks down all nearby moving foes. Recharges second[s] faster for each affected foe (maximum 25 seconds).

description.text: Elite Hex Spell. For seconds, target foe and all nearby foes attack, cast spells, and move 50% slower.

concise description.text: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target ( seconds). These foes attack, cast spells, and move 50% slower.

description.text: Binding Ritual. Create a level spirit. Whenever a non-spirit ally in its range takes damage or life steal, it is reduced by 15 and the spirit takes 15 damage. This spirit dies after  seconds.

concise description.text: Binding Ritual. Creates a level spirit ( second lifespan). Whenever a non-spirit ally within range takes damage or life steal, it is reduced by 15 and the spirit takes 15 damage.

description.text: Spell. Target ally is healed for . If any spirits are within earshot, you don't sacrifice Health.

concise description.text: Spell. Heals for . You don't sacrifice Health if you are within earshot of any spirits.

description.text: Hex Spell. For seconds, target foe and all nearby foes suffer  Health degeneration. When this hex is applied, these foes take  damage if you are within earshot of a spirit or corpse.

concise description.text: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target ( seconds). Causes Health degeneration. Initial effect: Deals  damage to these foes if you are within earshot of a spirit or corpse.

description.text: Spell. Target allied spirit is destroyed. All nearby enemies are struck for lightning damage and become blinded for  seconds.

concise description.text: Spell. Destroys target allied spirit. Deals lightning damage and inflicts Blindness condition ( seconds) to nearby foes.

description.text: Spell. Target foe is struck for lightning damage. If any spirits are within earshot, Spirit Burn causes Burning for  second[s].

concise description.text: Spell. Deals lightning damage. Inflicts Burning condition ( second[s]) if you are within earshot of a spirit.

description.text: Binding Ritual. Create a level Spirit that dies after 30 seconds. When this Spirit dies, all foes in the area take  damage for each second the Spirit was alive (maximum 150 damage).

concise description.text: Binding Ritual. Create a level Spirit that dies after 30 seconds. When this Spirit dies, all foes in the area take  damage for each second the Spirit was alive (maximum 150 damage).

description.text: Enchantment Spell. While you maintain Recall, nothing happens. When Recall ends, you Shadow Step to the ally you targeted when you activated this skill and all of your skills are disabled for 10 seconds.

concise description.text: Enchantment Spell. End effect: Shadow Step to target ally.

description.text: Spell. Target foe loses one enchantment. For every remaining enchantment, target foe is poisoned for seconds.

concise description.text: Spell. Removes one enchantment from target foe. Inflicts Poisoned condition ( seconds for each remaining enchantment on that foe).

description.text: Elite Spell. All foes in the area take earth damage and are Weakened for  second[s].  Nearby foes also take + earth damage and have Cracked Armor for  second[s].  Adjacent foes suffer the previous effects, take + earth damage, and are Blinded for  second[s].

concise description.text: Elite Spell. Foes in the area take earth damage and are Weakened ( second[s]). Nearby foes also take + earth damage and have Cracked Armor ( second[s]). Adjacent foes also take + earth damage and are Blinded ( second[s]).

description.text: Spell. Remove one condition from each party member. Party members relieved of Burning are healed for Health.

concise description.text: Spell. Affects all party members. Removes one condition. Party members relieved of Burning are healed for.

description.text: Spell. Target other ally is healed for . This spell has half the normal range.

concise description.text: Half Range Spell. Heals for.

description.text: Spell. Lose all enchantments. Each party member is healed for Health for each Monk enchantment lost.

concise description.text: Spell. Removes all of your enchantments. Heals all party members for for each Monk Enchantment removed.

concise description.text: Spell. The spirit nearest you loses Health. Heals target ally for 5 for each point of Health lost.

description.text: Binding Ritual. Create a level spirit. When this spirit dies, all party members in the area are resurrected with % Health and zero Energy. This spirit dies after 30 seconds.

concise description.text: Binding Ritual. Creates a level spirit (30 second lifespan). End effect: resurrects party members in the area with % Health and zero Energy.

description.text: Spell. Must follow a lead attack. Target foe becomes Crippled for seconds. This skill counts as an off-hand attack.

concise description.text: Spell. Inflicts Crippled condition ( seconds). This skill counts as an off-hand attack.

description.text: Dual Attack. Must follow a lead attack. Target foe's action is interrupted. If that action was casting a spell, target foe suffers 10 Overcast.

concise description.text: Dual Attack. Interrupts an action. Inflicts 10 Overcast if the interrupted action was a spell.

description.text: Off-Hand Attack. Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for + damage. If it misses, it takes an additional 15 seconds to recharge.

concise description.text: Off-Hand Attack. Deals + damage.

description.text: Spell. Destroy all nearby allies' spirits. For each spirit destroyed in this way, all party members are healed for Health.

description.text: Elite Enchantment Spell. For seconds, off-hand and dual attacks cost no Energy.

concise description.text: Elite Enchantment Spell. ( seconds.) Your off-hand and dual attacks cost no Energy.

description.text: Elite Off-Hand Attack. Must follow a lead attack. If this attack hits, target foe is Dazed and Blinded for seconds, and if target foe is casting a spell, that foe is interrupted.

concise description.text: Elite Off-Hand Attack. Interrupts a spell. Inflicts Dazed and Blindness conditions ( seconds).

description.text: Skill. Target foe loses 1 enchantment. All of your other non-attack skills are disabled for seconds. For each skill disabled in this way, target touched foe loses 1 additional enchantment.

description.text: Elite Axe Attack. Attack target foe and adjacent foes. Each attack that hits deals + damage.

description.text: Hammer Attack. If Renewing Smash hits, it deals + damage.  If you hit a knocked-down foe, you gain 3 Energy and this attack recharges instantly.

concise description.text: Hammer Attack. Deals + damage. You gain 3 Energy and this attack recharges instantly if target foe was knocked down.

description.text: Spell. Sacrifice 50% maximum Health. All nearby foes take 50 damage, and you bring the Holiday Blues to this location. For 30 seconds, foes within the area suffer -15 Health degeneration.

description.text: Shout. For 5 seconds, all allies within earshot move 10% faster. You gain 1 strike of adrenaline for each ally affected.

concise description.text: Shout. (5 seconds.) Allies in earshot move 10% faster. You gain 1 strike of adrenaline for each ally affected.

description.text: Off-Hand Attack. Must follow a lead attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for + damage and any stance being used by target foe ends. This attack cannot be blocked.

concise description.text: Off-Hand Attack. Deals + damage. Removes target foe's stance. Unblockable.

description.text: Lead Attack. If Mantis Sting hits, target foe takes + damage. If this attack strikes a moving foe, that foe is Crippled for seconds.

concise description.text: Lead Attack. Deals + damage. Inflicts Crippled condition ( seconds) if target foe is moving.

description.text: Elite Skill. Target touched foe takes damage and is Crippled for  second[s]. This skill counts as an off-hand attack.

concise description.text: Elite Touch Skill. Deals damage and inflicts Crippled condition ( second[s]). This skill counts as an off-hand attack.

description.text: Enchantment Spell. For seconds, whenever target ally is hit by a melee attack, all adjacent foes lose all adrenaline and 3 Energy.

description.text: Spell. Target foe loses one enchantment. If an enchantment is removed in this way, that foe also loses Energy.

description.text: Skill. Summon a level-25 celestial horror at your location. Each time the celestial horror successfully lands an attack, your party gains 25 Health and 3 Energy.

concise description.text: Skill. Summon a level 25 celestial horror. Your party members gain 25 Health and 3 Energy each time the celestial horror lands an attack.

description.text: Spell. Vampiric Swarm steals up to Health from up to three foes in the area.

description.text: Skill. Target touched foe loses Health and suffers from Weakness for  seconds.

concise description.text: Touch Skill. Causes Health loss. Inflicts Weakness condition ( seconds).

description.text: Elite Spell. You create Unsteady Ground at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, nearby foes take earth damage each second. Attacking foes struck by Unsteady Ground are knocked down.

description.text: Elite Spell. Target touched foe and all foes in the area are struck for fire damage and set on fire for  second[s]. For each foe you hit, gain 2 Energy.

concise description.text: Elite Touch Spell. Deals fire damage. Inflicts Burning ( seconds). "Seconds" is plural even when it's "1 second" [sic] Gain 2 Energy for each foe struck. Also hits foes in the area.

description.text: Skill. Create a celestial storm at target foe's location that lasts for 15 seconds. Each second, all foes in the area take 40 fire damage, 40 cold damage, 40 lightning damage, and 40 earth damage.

concise description.text: Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Heals for whenever target ally takes more than 50 damage.

concise description.text: Spell. Heals for.

description.text: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for + damage and your target suffers from one of the following conditions: Deep Wound (for 20 seconds), Weakness (for 20 seconds), Bleeding (for 25 seconds), or Crippled (for 15 seconds). After making a Drunken Blow, you are knocked down.

description.text: Skill. Target touched foe takes 50 damage and is knocked down for 5 seconds.

description.text: Trap. Create a Viper's Nest. When it is triggered, all nearby foes are struck for piercing damage and become Poisoned for  seconds. Viper's Nest expires after 90 seconds. This Trap is easily interrupted.

description.text: Item Spell. Hold Kaolai's ashes for up to seconds. While you hold his ashes, you gain 10 armor. When you drop his ashes, all party members are healed for  Health.

concise description.text: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to your target ( seconds). Removes ability to land a critical hit. Reduces damage by.

description.text: Hex Spell. For seconds, target foe and all foes in the area attack 50% slower.
